author: andreas
content:
Thanks. It could be worse. Actually it was time to use something different anyway. Unfortunately I have the original box and the receipt in Carinthia. I should have taken them to Vienna yesterday, but it didn't even occur to me, that they could be in Carinthia at all. 

OK, next week I bring it to the store, it will take likely weeks until I get notice from Tamron, so as I see it, the new stabilized Sigma 17-50/2.8 may well be available before I get the Tammy back. I'm just saying ðŸ™‚
